      • getUserOption

        public static int getUserOption​(java.lang.String title,
                                java.lang.String[] menu,
                                boolean addBackOption)
        Prints out a specified menu and receives an integer input from the user as the choice from the list of options.
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the menu to be displayed
        menu - Menu options to be provided for the user to select from
        addBackOption - To include a back option if required
        Returns:
        The option that the user selected
